meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tim Norris Karen Poole Jason Shore Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6490.

td.p: Tim Norris, an assistant district attorney from Knoxville, Tennessee
Karen Poole, a graduate student of paleontology from Washington, D.C.
Jason Shore, a medical student from Plano, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $45,200)

tr.td: THE CDC SAYS
THEIR ORIGINAL NAMES
BEER ME!
TURN UP THE HEAT
IT'S CHILE IN HERE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"In housing built before 1978 assume that the paint has" this toxic element "unless tests show otherwise"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "In housing built before 1978 assume that the paint has" this toxic element "unless tests show otherwise"
